title: ISBE Verifiable Attestation
description: Defines generic structure for any ISBE related Verifiable Credential

@context.description: Semantic context for the issued credential. First element must be https://www.w3.org/ns/credentials/v2 for VC DM v2 compliance

id.description: Globally unique identifier for the issued credential

type.description: Full type chain, used to identify the credential base types

validFrom.description: Defines the date and time, when the issued credential becomes valid

validUntil.description: Defines the date and time, when the issued credential expires

evidence.description: Contains information about the process which resulted in the issuance of the credential

id.description: If present, it MUST contain a URL that points to where more information about this instance of evidence can be found.

proof.description: Contains information about the proof. Within the ISBE ecosystem, credentialSubject cannot be an array.

proofPurpose.description: Defines the purpose of the proof

created.description: Defines the date and time, when the proof has been created

verificationMethod.description: Contains information about the verification method / proof mechanisms

jws.description: Defines the proof value in JWS format

credentialSubject.description: Defines information about the subject that is defined by the type chain. Within the ISBE ecosystem, credentialSubject cannot be an array.

id.description: Defines the DID of the subject that is described by the issued credential

credentialStatus.description: Defines revocation details for the issued credential. Further redefined by type extension.

id.description: Exact identity for the credential status

credentialSchema.description: Contains information about the credential schema on which the issued credential is based

id.description: References the credential schema stored on the Trusted Schemas Registry (TSR) on which the Verifiable Authorisation is based

termsOfUse.description: Contains the terms under which the issued credential was issued

id.description: Contains a URL that points to where more information about this instance of terms of use can be found.
